com.direwolfdigital.cake.data.achievemen: Do 4,000 damage to opposing Pokémon with your {F} Pokémon.
com.direwolfdigital.cake.rules.abilities: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 20 more damage for each heads.
Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Poisoned.

Discard all Energy attached to this Pokémon. During your opponent's next turn, if this Pokémon is damaged by an attack (even if this Pokémon is Knocked Out), put damage counters on the Attacking Pokémon equal to the damage done to this Pokémon.
This Pokémon can't use Shining Flame during your next turn.
Flip a coin. If heads, search your deck for up to 2 {R} Energy cards and attach them to this Pokémon. Shuffle your deck afterward.
playmat.prompt.xybsp_153.stoke: Choose up to 2 {R} Energy cards to attach to this Pokémon.
